video.title: Young & Hungry
video.synopsis: A female food blogger is hired as a personal chef by a young tech tycoon and faces a new menu of challenges, both inside and outside of the kitchen.

episodes.synopsis: Josh asks Gabi to cook dinner for him and his girlfriend to see if she's cut out to be his personal chef, but things don't quite go as planned.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: On her first day, Gabi must prepare a lavish dinner for Josh's visiting investors, and the day gets worse when Caroline accuses her of stealing.
episodes.title: Young & Ringless

episodes.synopsis: Josh hosts a dinner with the editor of a "30 Under 30" list, hoping to impress her, only to find out she's more interested in Gabi.
episodes.title: Young & Lesbian

episodes.synopsis: When Gabi takes a pregnancy test at work, a misunderstanding leads Josh to believe that Caroline is pregnant, disrupting their engagement party.
episodes.title: Young & Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Gabi starts dating Josh's neighbor, only to learn he's still in high school. Elliott tries to fit in with Josh's programmer pals.
episodes.title: Young & Younger

episodes.synopsis: Josh works to close a business deal with his high school rival, Cooper, but an incident with Gabi gets him in hot water.
episodes.title: Young & Punchy

episodes.synopsis: To keep their relationship a secret from Josh, Gabi forces Cooper to pretend he's dating Sofia. Elliott and Yolanda start a juice fast.
episodes.title: Young & Secret

episodes.synopsis: Gabi hosts a pop-up dinner to raise money to fix her beloved car, but a well-meaning Josh upsets her by buying her a new one.
episodes.title: Young & Car-less

episodes.synopsis: Yolanda gets a visit from her son, who's heartbroken in the wake of a breakup. Caroline temporarily moves in with Josh.
episodes.title: Young & Getting Played

episodes.synopsis: In a panic over her approaching wedding, Caroline forgets about Josh's 30th birthday, so Gabi lets her give him the special gift she had prepared.
episodes.title: Young & Thirty (and Getting Married!)

episodes.synopsis: Still conflicted about her feelings for Josh, Gabi goes on a three-week trip to China with Cooper. Meanwhile, Josh's personal life is in turmoil.
episodes.title: Young & Too Late

episodes.synopsis: Gabi returns from vacation happy to see that Josh has someone new in his life, until she discovers that the girl is an incredible cook.
episodes.title: Young & Cookin'

episodes.synopsis: Gabi scores an opportunity to write a collection of recipes, only to learn that all the recipes must feature pot.
episodes.title: Young & Munchies

episodes.synopsis: Gabi attempts to make sure Elliot has the perfect 40th birthday, but her plans lead to problems between Elliot and his boyfriend, Andre.
episodes.title: Young & Old

episodes.synopsis: Gabi's romantic plans for sleeping with Cooper for the first time are thwarted when Cooper discovers some information about Gabi.
episodes.title: Young & First Time

episodes.synopsis: When an apartment opens up across the hall, Gabi and Sofia set up Yolanda with their landlord to get an edge on the competition for the space.
episodes.title: Young & Moving

episodes.synopsis: Gabi and Josh reunite Shauna with her estranged daughter, but are shocked when the daughter turns out to be someone Josh knows from his past.
episodes.title: Young & Ferris Wheel

episodes.synopsis: After Sofia suffers through a series of terrible dates, Gabi is determined to help her by setting her up with a secret online dating account.
episodes.title: Young & Sandwich

episodes.synopsis: Sofia urges Josh to tell Gabi how he feels, but Cooper returns and once again ruins his opportunity. Alan opens a karaoke bar.
episodes.title: Young & Pretty Woman

episodes.synopsis: Gabi plans to quit her job and audition for an elite internship in Switzerland, but she needs a second chance after she blows the audition.
episodes.title: Young & Part Two

episodes.synopsis: Gabi returns from Switzerland in need of a job, but when she takes one with Josh's new neighbor, Josh jumps to conclusions about their relationship.
episodes.title: Young & How Gabi Got Her Job Back

episodes.synopsis: When Gabi makes a date with her cute neighbor, she tries to make sure Josh is cool with it by setting him up with a pretty girl.
episodes.title: Young & Back to Normal

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia announces that she quit her job, Gabi takes it upon herself to find her a new one and tries to get her hired as Josh's paid intern.
episodes.title: Young & Unemployed

episodes.synopsis: When Sofia's younger brother Benji comes to town, Gabi falls for him, only to discover that he isn't romantically interested in her.
episodes.title: Young & Oh, Brother!

episodes.synopsis: Gabi and Sofia get their fortunes told for laughs, but when the psychic accurately predicts an earthquake, they wonder what else will come to pass.
episodes.title: Young & Earthquake

episodes.synopsis: On the day Josh's app goes live, Gabi and Sofia give him a shirt. Later, they find out it belonged to Steve Jobs, and they need to get it back.
episodes.title: Young & Trashy

episodes.synopsis: Gabi tries to help Sofia by treating her to a spa day at a fancy hotel, but her plan goes awry when Sofia is mistaken for a prostitute.
episodes.title: Young & How Sofia Got Her Groove Back

episodes.synopsis: Sofia gets fed up with Gabi when she decides to rent out their apartment for the weekend. Yolanda and Elliot take in the Gay Pride Parade.
episodes.title: Young & Doppleganger

episodes.synopsis: Josh hires his brother as a chef for Alan and Elliot's wedding, and Gabi thinks he's a hot dish. Yolanda misplaces Elliot's ring.
episodes.title: Young & Younger Brother: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Josh has surprising news for Jake and Gabi. Alan and Elliot must convince a reluctant rabbi to bless their union.
episodes.title: Young & Younger Brother: Part 2
